events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to return it because it does not fit as expected and I would like a refund.
The system has categorized the customer issue as a refund request based on the message content.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you wish to return the jacket and get a refund – I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for us to proceed?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is new, tags still attached, and it’s in the original box.
Thank you for the details. We will email you a prepaid return shipping label so you can send the jacket back free of charge.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt assistance. I will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
The return process is initiated, and the refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the item.
We just wanted to check if you have returned the jacket and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, the jacket was sent back yesterday via the prepaid label and I appreciate your follow-up and support.
The refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us; we hope to serve you again soon.
